email.login.subject: [Jingangniu] Verify your login
email.login.content:
Verify your login!
Please use the following code to verify your login
Verification code:
{{code}}
The verification code will be valid for 5 minutes.
Please do not share this code with anyone.
email.register.subject: [Jingangniu] Verify your registration
email.register.content:
Verify your registration!
Please use the following code to verify your registration
Verification code:
{{code}}
The verification code will be valid for 5 minutes.
Please do not share this code with anyone.
email.request.subject: [Jingangniu] Verify your password reset request
email.request.content:
Verify your password reset request
You've requested to reset the password.
please use the 6-digit code below:
{{code}}
The verification code will be valid for 5 minutes.
Please do not share this code with anyone.
email.reset.subject: [Jingangniu] Password reset
email.reset.content: Password reset Note: After updating your password, we'll disable withdrawals for 24 hours. To confirm your request, {{url}} The url will be valid for 5 minutes. Please do not share this url with anyone.
email.reset-success.subject: [Jingangniu] Password reset
email.reset-success.content:
Password reset
Your password has been changed successfully. 
To be extra safe, log out of all active sessions and log in using your new password. 
If you didn't make this change, please contact our support team for assistance.
error.32700: Invalid JSON was received by the server. An error occurred on the server while parsing the JSON text.
error.32600: The JSON sent is not a valid Request object.
error.32601: The method does not exist / is not available.
